static const char tiles_apple[] = {
	// 1 tile
	0b00101100,
	0b00011000,
	0b01110110,
	0b10011111,
	0b10111111,
	0b11111111,
	0b01111110,
	0b00111100,
};

static const char tiles_snakeHead[] = {
	// 4 tiles

	// snake head up
	0b00000000,
	0b00111100,
	0b01000010,
	0b01000010,
	0b10100101,
	0b11000011,
	0b10000001,
	0b01000010,

	// snake head right
	0b01111110,
	0b10100001,
	0b00110001,
	0b00001111,
	0b00010010,
	0b10011000,
	0b01100100,
	0b00011100,

	// snake head down
	0b01000010,
	0b11100111,
	0b10100101,
	0b01000010,
	0b01111110,
	0b00100100,
	0b01000010,
	0b00111100,

	// snake head left
	0b01111110,
	0b10000101,
	0b10001100,
	0b11110000,
	0b01001000,
	0b00011001,
	0b00100110,
	0b00111000,
};

static const char tiles_snakeBody[] = {
	// 1 tile
	0b00111100,
	0b01111110,
	0b10011111,
	0b10111111,
	0b11111111,
	0b11111111,
	0b01111110,
	0b00111100,
};

static const char tiles_headXplod[] = {
	// 8 tiles

	// Frame 1
	0b00000000,
	0b00000000,
	0b00000000,
	0b00011000,
	0b00111000,
	0b00000100,
	0b00000000,
	0b00000000,

	// Frame 2
	0b00000000,
	0b00000000,
	0b00010100,
	0b00111000,
	0b00111100,
	0b00100100,
	0b00000010,
	0b00000000,

	0b00010010,
	0b01001110,
	0b01111100,

	0b00111110,
	0b00100110,
	0b00000000,

	0b11000101,
	0b01101110,
	0b01111111,
	0b01110110,
	0b10100011,

	0b01000110,
	0b11000001,
	0b01000110,

	0b01110110,
	0b10100011,

	0b01011011,
	0b01010110,
	0b10100011,

	0b00000001,
	0b01001000,
	0b10100011,

	0b00000000,
	0b00000000,

	0b00000000,

};

static const char tiles_vine[] = {
	// 6 tiles

	// vine vertical
	0b01011100,
	0b01100110,
	0b00111010,
	0b00011100,
	0b01101110,
	0b11001100,
	0b01110100,
	0b00111000,

	// vine horizontal
	0b00000100,
	0b11001110,
	0b01101011,
	0b10110011,
	0b10111101,
	0b11011110,
	0b01101000,
	0b00000000,

	// vine top-left
	0b01111100,
	0b11000110,
	0b01010110,
	0b00110110,
	0b01101101,
	0b11001101,
	0b01110100,
	0b00111000,

	// vine bottom-left
	0b01011000,
	0b11011011,
	0b10001101,
	0b11000110,
	0b01101011,
	0b00111101,
	0b00100000,
	0b11000000

	// vine top-right
	0b00000010,
	0b01111001,
	0b11101101,
	0b01000111,
	0b10001110,
	0b11001100,
	0b01110100,
	0b00111000,

	// vine bottom-right
	0b00011100,
	0b00101110,
	0b01110110,
	0b10100111,
	0b10001110,
	0b11111100,
	0b01110100,
	0b00100000,
};

	// grass 0
